name: Hyper Beat Engine
description:
High-speed racing to the beat! Made for Ludum Dare 41 in 48 hours.

Please report any bugs from other versions - only tested on Windows.

How to play:

Use Space to hit a pulse when it reaches your heart to speed up. Hold down Space to use boost if you have any (meter to the right). Use the Left and Right arrow keys to turn, and follow the Up and Down arrow key prompts at the bottom to generate more boost.

Changelog:

New build with rhythm and camera fixes has been uploaded.
